ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.
M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: In the past month, how many times have you seen content on social media related to: Safe alcohol use (e.g., avoid driving intoxicated, do not accept drinks from strangers)?
Notes: 0 = 0 times; 1 = 1-2 times; 2 = 3-9 times; 3 = More than 10 times

ElementDescription: In the past month, how many times have you seen content on social media related to: Sobriety and/or abstinence from alcohol use (Sober October, dry January, sober curious)?
Notes: 0 = 0 times; 1 = 1-2 times; 2 = 3-9 times; 3 = More than 10 times

ElementDescription: In the past month, how many times have you seen content on social media related to: Cutting down on alcohol use (only drinking on weekends, or setting limits for how much you will drink in a night)?
Notes: 0 = 0 times; 1 = 1-2 times; 2 = 3-9 times; 3 = More than 10 times

ElementDescription: In the past month, how many times have you seen content on social media related to: Struggles with addiction or recovery efforts?
Notes: 0 = 0 times; 1 = 1-2 times; 2 = 3-9 times; 3 = More than 10 times

ElementDescription: When you read newspapers or magazines, how often do you see content promoting safety and moderation from alcohol use?
Notes: 0 = Never; 1 = Rarely; 2 = Sometimes; 3 = Most of the time; 4 = Always

ElementDescription: When you read newspapers or magazines, how often do you see content promoting sobriety and abstinence from alcohol use?
Notes: 0 = Never; 1 = Rarely; 2 = Sometimes; 3 = Most of the time; 4 = Always

ElementDescription: When you watch TV or go to the movies, how often do you see characters talking about promoting safety and moderation from alcohol use?
Notes: 0 = Never; 1 = Rarely; 2 = Sometimes; 3 = Most of the time; 4 = Always

ElementDescription: When you watch TV or go to the movies, how often do you see characters talking about promoting sobriety and abstinence from alcohol use?
Notes: 0 = Never; 1 = Rarely; 2 = Sometimes; 3 = Most of the time; 4 = Always
